fullText: The musical adaptation of Nicholas Sparks' beloved novel brings genuine emotion to the stage, though it struggles at times to escape the shadow of its film predecessor.
dtliExcerpt: The musical adaptation of Nicholas Sparks' beloved novel brings genuine emotion to the stage, though it struggles at times to escape the shadow of its film predecessor.
